title: Vibe Coding: The AI Revolution in Software Development
subtitle: Current Situation, Challenges, and Future Outlook

slides.title: The Rise of Vibe Coding
content: Collins Dictionary's 2025 Word of the Year
Coined by OpenAI's Andrej Karpathy in February 2025
AI-powered approach to converting natural language into code
82% of developers now use AI coding tools daily
slides.image_prompt: A futuristic, visually stunning title slide featuring a human brain connected to flowing lines of code, with a gradient background transitioning from deep purple to electric blue. The word 'VIBECODING' appears in modern, glitch-style typography with subtle AI circuit patterns overlaying the background. Include Collins Dictionary word of the year badge and Andrej Karpathy's name subtly integrated.
slides.visual_style: Modern, tech-forward with AI aesthetic - gradient blues and purples, sleek typography, subtle circuit board patterns

slides.title: What is Vibe Coding?
content: Describing desired outcomes in natural language
AI generates complete code based on user descriptions
Democratizes software development for non-technical users
Blends human creativity with AI efficiency
slides.image_prompt: A split-screen visualization showing on the left side a person speaking naturally with thought bubbles, and on the right side those thoughts transforming into structured code. Include icons representing different programming languages and a central AI brain connecting both sides. The design should feel collaborative and empowering.
slides.visual_style: Clean, professional with AI-human collaboration imagery, soft blue and white color scheme, clear visual hierarchy

slides.title: Current Adoption & Impact
content: 90% of engineering teams have adopted AI coding tools
78% report enhanced productivity with AI code solutions
62% achieved at least 25% productivity increase
Rapid prototyping and faster time-to-market
slides.image_prompt: An infographic-style slide featuring multiple data visualization elements: a large circular progress chart showing 90% adoption, bar graphs displaying productivity metrics, and upward trending arrows representing growth. Include developer avatars and code editor icons to represent the survey participants. Use a clean, data-driven design with accent colors.
slides.visual_style: Data-driven with charts and statistics visualization, professional corporate look with clear data presentation

slides.title: Key Benefits Driving Adoption
content: Accelerated development cycles
Reduced repetitive coding tasks
Lower barrier to entry for new developers
Enhanced creativity through rapid iteration
slides.image_prompt: A positive, benefit-focused visual showing a timeline that compresses from long to short, representing accelerated development. Include icons for speed (lightning bolts), automation (robots), accessibility (open doors), and creativity (light bulbs). Use upward trending arrows and growth indicators. The overall feel should be optimistic and forward-moving.
slides.visual_style: Positive, benefit-focused with upward trending graphics, green and blue color palette, energetic and motivating

slides.title: Current Challenges & Struggles
content: Code quality and consistency issues
Security vulnerabilities in AI-generated code
Technical debt accumulation
Developer skill degradation concerns
slides.image_prompt: A balanced cautionary visual showing warning triangles and exclamation marks, but not overly alarming. Include icons representing broken code snippets, security shields with cracks, accumulating debt stacks, and fading skill charts. Use a muted color palette with orange warnings but maintain professional tone. The design should convey concern without fear-mongering.
slides.visual_style: Cautionary approach with warning symbols and balanced perspective, orange and gray color scheme, clear problem identification

slides.title: Developer Skepticism & Backlash
content: Fear of job displacement and skill obsolescence
Quality control and testing challenges
Ethical concerns about AI dependency
Need for proper guardrails and oversight
slides.image_prompt: A balanced debate-style visual showing two sides of the issue. On one side, concerned developers with question marks and thinking bubbles about job security. On the other side, balanced scales representing ethics and oversight. Include icons for testing, security, and governance. The design should acknowledge valid concerns while remaining objective.
slides.visual_style: Balanced view showing both sides of the debate, split-screen design, neutral colors with thoughtful imagery

slides.title: The Future of Vibe Coding
content: Hybrid human-AI collaboration models
Autonomous coding agents for routine tasks
Enhanced security and quality controls
New developer roles: AI prompters and validators
slides.image_prompt: A futuristic, forward-looking scene showing humans and AI working seamlessly together. Include autonomous coding robots, holographic interfaces, and next-gen development environments. Show emerging job roles with new skill icons. The design should feel optimistic and technologically advanced, with a clean white and blue color scheme.
slides.visual_style: Forward-looking with futuristic technology imagery, white and electric blue palette, sleek and modern design

slides.title: Key Takeaways & Recommendations
content: Use vibe coding for prototyping, not production
Maintain strong human oversight for critical systems
Invest in AI literacy and new skill development
Balance speed with security and quality
slides.image_prompt: A clean, summary-focused slide with clear action items. Include checkmarks, roadmaps, and balance scales. Show a pathway from prototype to production with human oversight gates. Include icons for learning, security, and quality assurance. The design should be clear, actionable, and provide a strong conclusion.
slides.visual_style: Summary-focused with clear action items and recommendations, professional corporate style with teal and navy colors
